sentences.en: A device which a gyroscope and which gives a whistling sound when someone untrustworthy is around.
sentences.cn: 当周围有不可信任的人时,它就会发出像口哨一样的声音.

sentences.en: Causal inference in folk science is equally untrustworthy.
sentences.cn: 民俗科学的因果推论也同样不可靠.

sentences.en: His opponents still say he's a fundamentally untrustworthy figure.
sentences.cn: 他的对手依然说他根本不可信。

sentences.en: His words and deeds are full of contradictions and he is untrustworthy.
sentences.cn: 他的言行矛盾百出,让人难以相信.

sentences.en: I think he is shallow, vain and untrustworthy.
sentences.cn: 我认为他肤浅、自负、不可靠。

sentences.en: It is a self - fulfilling prophecy to assume that your information workers are untrustworthy.
sentences.cn: 它是个 自以为是 的预言,认为你的信息工作者是不值得信任的.

sentences.en: Jasper is an untrustworthy man. Don't bargain on his honesty.
sentences.cn: 贾斯帕是个不值得信赖的人. 不要指望他会诚实.

sentences.en: None of us could persuade him out of lending his money to that untrustworthy man.
sentences.cn: 我们谁都不能说服他不要借钱给那个不可靠的人.

sentences.en: Solutions should allow programs untrustworthy to run instead and prevent their dangerous behavior.
sentences.cn: 可行的解决方法应允许不可靠程序运行,并同时防止不可靠程序的危险行为.

sentences.en: The most adored relative, the cherished lover, the dearest friend may inspire devotion, yet remain untrustworthy.
sentences.cn: 最喜爱的亲戚 、 最珍视的爱人; 最亲密的朋友可以激起我们的挚爱, 但不一定值得信任.
这个统计分析是不真实不可信赖的.

sentences.en: We discovered him to be quite untrustworthy.
sentences.cn: 我们发现他很不可信赖.

sentences.en: You can't go by what he says; he's very untrustworthy.
sentences.cn: 你不能根据他的话判断, 他是很不可靠的.

trans.tran_en: someone who is untrustworthy cannot be trusted
